text: Caroline, Princess of Hanover (Caroline Louise Marguerite Grimaldi; born 23 January 1957), is the oldest child of Rainier III, Prince of Monaco, and the American actress Grace Kelly. She is the oldest sister of Prince Albert II and Princess St√©phanie. Until the births of her niece and nephew, Princess Gabriella and Prince Jacques, in December 2014, Caroline was the heir presumptive to the throne of Monaco. Caroline is married to Ernst August, Prince of Hanover (born 1954). ==Titles and styles == *23 January 1957-23 January 1999: Her Serene Highness Princess Caroline of Monaco *23 January 1999-present Her Royal Highness The Princess of Hanover ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Princes and princesses of Monaco Category:Heirs and heiresses presumptive
title: Caroline, Princess of Hanover
